title: Gekkan Shoujo Nozaki-kun - Chotto Iikagen Hanashite Kudasai Seo-senpai! (Doujinshi)
description:
Seo hears some girls talking about sex, so she decides to do a private research on the topic with Wakamatsu - whether he's willing to go with it or not.

It basically goes exactly as one would expect it would when Yuzuki sets her mind on something.
